author: Kyle Balluck
title: CNN's Cuomo: 'Telling the truth about Trump' more dangerous for Fauci than coronavirus
description: Chris Cuomo said Monday night that "telling the truth about [President] Trump" was more dangerous for Dr. Anthony Fauci than coronavirus, with the CNN host noting that the director of the National Institute of Allergy and...
